am_hal_spotmgr.h File Reference

SPOT manager functions that manage power states. More...

Detailed Description

SPOT manager functions that manage power states.

#include "am_hal_spotmgr_trimver_1.h"
#include "am_hal_spotmgr_trimver_2.h"

Functions

uint32_t am_hal_spotmgr_power_state_update (am_hal_spotmgr_stimulus_e eStimulus, bool bOn, void *pArgs)
 Power states update This API should be called before turning things on and after turning things off, or before switching to high performance mode and after switching to low power mode, or when temperature range is changed.
